Package com.kakao.kakaolink.v2

Provide API to send Kakaotalk Link messages with message template v2.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    KakaoLinkCallback  
    KakaoLinkResponse
    Template validation에 성공하였을 때 반환되는 response.
    KakaoLinkService
    Class for sending KakaoTalk messages using KakaoLink v2 API.
